texts.biography: Ivor's lineage can be traced back nearly to the Silence.  Though bred as nobility, he has always been a hothead, preferring to lead an attack rather than wait to be attacked.  His brashness has so far kept him alive.
texts.name: Ivor

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Wood Elves or Grand Elves for each level attained after 3rd level.
specialty.name: Elves
